童年fps启蒙之作,cod,荣誉勋章和css
小时候玩游戏基本由我爹一手所带,除了玩玩家里的ps2就是在那台老电脑上打css,一台lg的17寸显示器,处理器还是奔腾3
盗版入坑就被精致的画面吸引,刚玩不久不会加人机,便去italy的水果摊打水果玩,那种至今都特别解压的感觉也是我玩这个游戏的目的
后来老爹教了我加人机,便沉迷在和简单人机对枪,一打通常就是一个下午,晚上和家人散个步,那时看着普普通通的一天,是我现在想回也回不去的时光
垂髫稚子逐渐成熟,2021css入正,随意点开了一个服务器,发现还是有很多的玩家活跃着,熟悉的菜单和购买界面,熟悉的人机名字,童年的感觉却找不回来了,当初无所谓输赢,现在却只想着赢,当初学习如何跟简单人机捉迷藏,如今学习枪法,道具,定位,身法,游戏的真谛似乎逐渐在与我背道而驰
今年一月,我爹将那台老主机以80元卖给了废品贩子,那台黑色的ps2也早已找不着了,父亲早已不玩游戏,每天拿着电脑也就看看当下的热剧
有时童年很廉价,廉价到一只雪糕就能开心一整天,又廉价到只值80块钱
-2022/6/9 2:45

Source is a 3D game engine developed by Valve. It debuted as the successor to GoldSrc with Half-Life: Source in June 2004, followed by Counter-Strike: Source and Half-Life 2 later that year. Source does not have a concise version numbering scheme; instead, it is designed in constant incremental updates. The engine was succeeded by Source 2.

It is as it's always been.

Fallout 76 is a lot of things

This game has a lot of potential in my mind but at the state that it is right now i could not recommend buying it.

It has terrible performance issues and frame drops playing on high settings on a 2080 super, for a product that is basically a re-hash of fallout 4, a game that at the time i'm writing this came out 5 years ago.

The whole "survival" system is completly pointless and more than anything is annoying, the stash limit HAS to be expanded, AGAIN, 800 weight is way too little of a stash capacity if you consider that you have to put everything there.

Then we have to talk about Fallout first.
It has to be reworked or repriced because the only pro i can see in getting it now is unlimited junk capacity and that's blatant p2w standards in a game that i already have payed for, keep in mind that it costs 120 euros for a yearly subscription where i live, which is completly unacceptable.

While wastelanders helped a bit with the story i would recommend to stay away from it if you like your lore, most things in this game don't make any sense and are completly forgettable, but your mileage may vary

Other than that i personally like the core gameplay: loot - shoot - return
